Text: Your Fatbrain Order PST Thank you for shopping at Fatbraincom As a new customer you will discover that our site is the most comprehensive source for professional and technical books training corporate publishing and more We have provided the details of your order below As a part of our ongoing customer service commitment to keep you informed we will send you an email confirmation the day your order ships To view the status of your order simply visit our account management page at aspactmgmtsecureasp If you have any questions please email us at or call FATBRAIN Monday through Friday AMPM EST International customers please call We appreciate your business and hope you visit us again at The Customer Service Team Fatbraincom Shipping Your order will ship via Second Day To estimate arrival please add business days for shipping to item availability QTY PRICE TITLE AVAILABLE Financial Futures and Options A Guide t Ships HoursSame Day Avail Net Product Gift Wrap Tax Shipping Total Order Price Credit Card Please note Taxes indicated on this order confirmation are estimates only At time of shipment Fatbrain calculates applicable local sales tax on all products and shipping services in CA NY NJ KY NV VA and TN Check your final statement for exact taxes charged The Goods and Services Tax GST is applied to orders delivered in Canada
